sentences.en: A fresh cascade of splintered glass tinkled to the floor.
sentences.cn: 大量刚裂开的玻璃碎片叮叮当当地落到地板上。

sentences.en: a polished wooden floor
sentences.cn: 上过蜡的木地板

sentences.en: a puddle of water on the kitchen floor
sentences.cn: 厨房地面上的一摊水

sentences.en: a warehouse that has 410,000 square feet of floor space
sentences.cn: 楼面面积为41万平方英尺的仓库

sentences.en: Bob slid from his chair and lay prone on the floor.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃从椅子上滑下来，趴在了地板上。

sentences.en: Books are often stacked in higgledy-piggledy piles on the floor.
sentences.cn: 书本经常乱七八糟地堆在地板上。

sentences.en: Constant wheelchair use will scuff almost any floor surface.
sentences.cn: 任何地板上经常有轮椅走动几乎都会有所磨损。

sentences.en: He was holding a cloth that dripped pink drops upon the floor.
sentences.cn: 他正拿着一块布，布上粉红色的水滴落在地板上。

sentences.en: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor.
sentences.cn: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

sentences.en: Mcanally's knees buckled and he crumpled down onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 麦卡纳利双膝发软，瘫倒在地板上。

sentences.en: Our office is on the top floor.
sentences.cn: 我们的办公室在顶层

sentences.en: questions from the floor will be invited.
sentences.cn: 欢迎台下各位提问。

sentences.en: She had been sitting with her knitting at her fourth-floor window.
sentences.cn: 她那时正坐在5楼的窗前织东西。

sentences.en: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentences.cn: 她带他参观了这处空房子的底楼。

sentences.en: The elevator creaked to a halt at the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯嘎吱一声停在了一层。

sentences.en: The fridge door was open and food was scattered across the floor.
sentences.cn: 冰箱门开着，食物散落在地板上。

sentences.en: The sand on the floor scrunched under our feet.
sentences.cn: 地板上的沙子在我们脚下嘎吱作响。

sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.
sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.

sentences.en: They just rolled about on the floor punching each other like schoolboys.
sentences.cn: 他们像小学生一样，在地板上滚来滚去，互相挥着拳头揍对方。

sentences.en: Wilde fell and struck his head on the stone floor.
sentences.cn: 怀尔德摔倒了，头撞在石头地上。

words.tran_cn: 地板；地板材料；室内地面；铺地板
在…上铺地板；击败（floor的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: （讲话，提问）来自台下（观众，听众）
扫地；清洁地面；清扫地板，拖地板

trans.tran_cn: 地面，地板，楼层，底部，议员席
trans.tran_en: the flat surface that you stand on inside a building
the flat surface that you stand on inside a building

trans.tran_cn: 铺地板；打倒，击倒；（被困难）难倒
trans.tran_en: to hit someone so hard that they fall down
